name: the-darkening
description:
Global black style that doesn't suck. All syntax highlighting is kept while being dead simple.

To make iframes nicely dark as well, this style is meant to be used with Stylus, and you must go into it's options and enable "Expose iframes via HTML[stylus-iframe]".
